laboratory_examinations.findings: Severe nasal airway problems due to prior septal operation; history of skin ulcerations consistent with Beh√ßet disease.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: After surgery, widespread small aphthous pustular lesions developed on the fourth postoperative day but regressed within five days without scarring.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Dysplastic bone exhibited typical histopathological appearance; after autoclaving, significant deformation of dysplastic cells with no destruction of the noncellular frame.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Histopathological examination after three years showed fibrovascular connective tissue and viable osteocytes, indicating normal bone healing.
